comments:
i0601-0010

- selected a .project file in the package explorer 
- right clicked on Team -> Show history
- note that I also had the "link with editor" button selected in the History view
- closed the project via the context menu and got the following exception

!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.core 4 4 2007-06-04 16:04:47.293
!MESSAGE The parent folder of managed file /org.apache.commons.net/.project does not have sync info associated with it.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-06-04 16:04:47.463
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Fetching CVS revision history".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseFile.getLogEntries(EclipseFile.java:287)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.filehistory.CVSFileHistory.refresh(CVSFileHistory.java:98)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.CVSHistoryPage$RefreshCVSFileHistory.run(CVSHistoryPage.java:1319)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

Sorry, the "link with editor" wasn't selected.

Also I only had "show remote revisions" selected.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 190434 ***
